verbs.description: After [ARG1: a life] [V: noted] [ARG2: both for its brilliance and its ironies] , satire died on May 9 , 2018 . An autopsy will be performed , but experts point to a statement by new NRA President Oliver North that urged President Trump to punish anyone who does business with Iran as the definitive cause of death . To be sure , …
